List common vulnerabilities relevant to this type of system and how to mitigate them.

Instructions
- Identify vulnerabilities by category (authn/authz, injection, XSS/CSRF, SSRF, insecure deserialization, secrets handling, supply chain, logging/PII).
- Provide concrete mitigations and “how to verify” guidance (tests, linters, code review checks, runtime controls).

Output
- A prioritized vulnerability list with mitigations and verification steps.
